Quartz.description: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines.

Earth Crystal.description: A resinous substance found near the surface.

Frozen Tear.description: A crystal fabled to be the frozen tears of a yeti.

Fire Quartz.description: A glowing red crystal commonly found near hot lava.

Emerald.description: A precious stone with a brilliant green color.

Ruby.description: A precious stone that is sought after for its rich color and beautiful luster.

Topaz.description: Fairly common but still prized for its beauty.

Prismatic Shard.description: A very rare and powerful substance with unknown origins.

Copper.description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.

Iron.description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.

Gold.description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.

Iridium.description: An exotic ore with many curious properties. Can be smelted into bars.

Coal.description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.
